dialogues.text: (overcomes his shyness) I’m Boq. From Munchkinland. And I know we don’t know each other, but--

Elphaba, he’s everything I ever wanted!
He said he was too shy to ask me, at first, but then, Galinda emboldened him--
Don’t! Don’t you dare say another word against her! I’m about to have the happiest night of my life, thanks to Galinda! (sings) FIN’LLY FOR THIS ONE NIGHT I’M ABOUT TO HAVE A FUN NIGHT

dialogues.character: AND I ONLY WISH THERE WERE
dialogues.text: SOMETHING I COULD DO FOR HER
AND GALINDA HELPED IT COME TRUE

Boq! I just thought-- Galinda?! But Nessa won’t tolerate any more Galinda bashing-- ELPHABA, SEE? Elphaba, seeing her joy, ta

scenes.heading: EXT. SHIZ CAMPUS - DORMITORIES - EVENING
scenes.actionPreview: 46 46 Inside each window, STUDENTS prepare for a wild night.

scenes.heading: INT. THE GIRLS’ DORM ROOM - EVENING

dialogues.text: Oh dear, my granny makes me the most hideoteous hats! (off their judge-y looks) I’d give it away, but-- I don’t hate anyone that much.
--go, we have to-- PFANNEE/SHENSHEN --accessorize each other! See you soon! (like they’re all friends)
Galinda-- Nessa and I were talking.
And we were just talking about
Because everyone will be there. And don’t tell me you’ve nothing to wear, you could wear-- let’s see--
(CONT’D) I mean, it goes with everything you own!
SO HERE, OUT OF THE GOODNESS OF MY HEART.

scenes.actionPreview: 47 47 Galinda is being fastened into her party frock by Pfannee-- as ShenShen looks through one of Galinda’s many trunks. scenes.heading: EXT. SHIZ - QUAD - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 48 48 Students, including Galinda and Fiyero, all dressed for a night on the town, move stealthily through the quad--

scenes.heading: EXT. SHIZ CAMPUS - ENTRANCE COURTYARD - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 48A 48A The Students hurry to the water’s edge, pile into waiting boats... Except Fiyero. He waits, and now we see why: Boq and Nessa appear. Fiyero greets Boq like they’re old friends, then makes sure Nessa gets safely into a boat-- Galinda takes this in. Falling a little in love.

scenes.heading: EXT. SHIZ - MORRIBLE’S QUARTERS - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 49 49 Elphaba hesitates, then-- KNOCKS. After a beat, Morrible opens the door, dressed for bed, and surprised to see her prize student.

scenes.heading: EXT. LAKESIDE FOREST - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 50 50 Fiyero confidently leads the group along the lake’s edge and through the woods. As they pass some night-blooming flowers, Fiyero leans down to a pink flower, politely-- The Flower graciously dips its petals, and he gently picks it, presents it to Galinda. She’s blown away. The group follows Fi

scenes.heading: INT. THE OZDUST - NIGHT

dialogues.text: UH, NESSA I’VE GOT SOMETHING TO CONFESS-- A REASON WHY-- WELL-- WHY I ASKED YOU HERE
AND I KNOW IT ISN’T FAIR--
IT’S BECAUSE I’M IN THIS CHAIR AND YOU FELT SORRY FOR ME-- WELL? ISN’T THAT RIGHT?
OH BOQ, I THINK YOU’RE WONDERFUL
DON’T YOU SEE, THIS IS OUR CHANCE?

scenes.actionPreview: 53 53 A WAVE OF SOUND and UNUSUAL SIGHTS welcome the group as they enter this BALLROOM. The atmosphere is deliciously illicit. A pumped CROWD (some ANIMALS, some PEOPLE) animates the dance floor. A SWINGING BAND -- (a mix of ANIMAL and HUMAN MUSICIANS) BLASTS AWAY on the make-shift stage. Fiyero pro

scenes.heading: INT. THE

dialogues.text: The rest of you can go on doing-- whatever this is.
I have no faith in you, dear. This was your roommate’s idea, not mine.
Miss E lphaba has requested that I
I’m a sorceress, not a mind reader! I’ve no idea why! But
I’ll say this much, she doesn’t give a twig what anyone thinks.
Of course she does. She just pretends not to.
Why? It’s not like it’s your fault.
AND HERE ’S A STRANGE THING: YOUR LIFE COULD END UP CHANGING WHILE YOU’RE DANCING THROUGH!

scenes.actionPreview: OZDUST - SAME 55 55 A SONG ENDS-- everyone on the dance floor APPLAUDS. Just then, Morrible appears. Our group stops in their tracks. Morrible approaches a stunned Galinda. Galinda is frozen with fear, but also-- a little tipsy. Morrible takes her hand, leads her away, as... The others breathe sighs

scenes.heading: INT. SHIZ - GIRLS’ DORM ROOM - LATER THAT NIGHT
characters: I SIMPLY HAVE TO TAKE OVER
SO IT'S VERY SHREWD TO BE

dialogues.text: That was your very first party? (spits)
I know! Let’s each tell the other something we’ve never told an yone! I’ll go first: Fiyero and I are getting married!
Like-- why do you sleep with this-- (grabs it) --little green bottle under your pillow?
It was my mother’s, that’s all.
Well that’s not fair, I told you a really good one.
That my sister is-- the way she is. (a beat)
He was so worried, he made our mother chew milk flowers, day and night. Only it made Nessa c ome too soon... with her little legs all tangled. And our mother... never woke up.
But that was the milkflowers’ fault, not yours.
And you can call me... Galinda.
Let’s not quarrel. Because Elphie-- now that we’re friends, I’ve decided to make you my new project!
You really don’t have to do that.
I know! That’s what makes me so nice!
(AND LET’S FACE IT--WHO ISN’T LESS FORTUNATE THAN I?)
AND WHEN SOMEONE NEEDS A MAKEOVER

dialogues.character: I SIMPLY HAVE TO TAKE OVER
dialogues.text: I KNOW I KNOW EXACTLY WHAT THEY NEED
(putting Elphaba’s glasses back on her) DON’T WORRY-- I’M DETERMINED TO SUCCEED
She hops up, and hits the top of a wardrobe case-- it pops open, revealing an array of garments.
(CONT’D) POPULAR! YOU’RE GONNA BE POPULAR! I’LL TEACH YOU THE PROPER PLOYS
LITTLE WAYS TO FLIRT AND FLOUNCE I’LL SHOW YOU W HAT SHOES TO WEAR
EVERYTHING THAT REALLY COUNTS TO BE POPULAR! I’LL HELP YOU BE POPULAR! YOU’LL HANG WITH THE RIGHT COHORTS YOU’LL BE GOOD AT SPORTS KNOW THE SLANG YOU’VE GOT TO KNOW SO LET’S START
(CONT’D) ‘CAUSE YOU’VE GOT AN AWF’LLY LONG WAY TO
Galinda shines a bright light in Elphaba’s face like a police interrogati on, examines her complexion with a magnifying glass--
(CONT’D) DON’T BE OFFENDED BY MY FRANK ANALYSIS THINK OF IT AS PERSONALITY DIALYSIS NOW THAT I’VE CHOSEN TO BECOME A PAL, A SIS-
THERE’S NOBODY WISER NOT WHEN IT COMES TO POPULAR --
THERE'S NOTHING THAT CAN STOP YOU FROM BECOMING POPU-
Galinda dances around the room, in sheer anticipation...
Elphie! You mustn’t think that way-- your whole life is going to change!
(CONT’D) WHEN I SEE DEPRESSING CREATURES WITH UNPREPOSSESSING FEATURES I REMIND THEM ON THEIR OWN BEHALF
CELEBRATED HEADS OF STATE OR SPECIALLY GREAT COMMUNICATORS DID THEY HAVE BRAINS OR KNOWLEDGE?
(CONT’D) DON'T MAKE ME LAUGH! THEY WERE-- POPULAR! PLEASE-- IT'S ALL ABOUT POPULAR!
I can’t wear things like that anyway.
Of course you can. We’ll just start... smaller.
YOU'RE GONNA GRIN AND BEAR IT YOUR NEW-FOUND POPULARI TY -- LA, LA, LA, LA...
The rising sun turns Galinda’s silhouette pink as she triumphantly climbs her tower of luggage--
(CONT’D) JUST NOT QUITE AS POPULAR AS ME!

scenes.actionPreview: 56 56 Elphaba shrugs out of her clothes, Galinda brushes her teeth at the washbasin, as they continue bonding... Ever? Elphaba yanks her worn nightgown over her head-- Galinda takes the pink flower Fiyero gave her from her hair, places it carefully in a glass of water... The girls flop on Elphaba’s

scenes.heading: EXT. SHIZ

dialogues.text: LIFE.” It’s coming from-- AN OZIAN RADIO, The five friends sit around a crackling CAMPFIRE. Nessa helps Boq toss kindling on the fire, crackling in the fireplace. Galinda and Elphaba laugh until they cry. Fiyero is
ME, YOU, YOU AND YOU...AND YOU
AND WATCH US DANCE ON THROUGH...

scenes.heading: INT. DILLAMOND’S CLASSROOM - DAY

dialogues.text: Doctor Dillamond, I picked some poppies for you--
It’s alright, Miss Elphaba... I’ll be alright.
Students, remain calm, please, there’s no cause for alarm--
Don’t worry! They can take away my job, but I shall continue speaking out!
Miss Elphaba, I’m afraid it’s out of our hands.

Students, your new history professor has prepared a special presentation! PROFESSOR NIKIDIK, somber, human, enters. He carries a rectangular, cloth-covered package, pushes Dilla mond’s vase of poppies roughly to one side, and places the package on
In times such as these, it behooves us all, not merely to study the past, but to look to the future...
This remarkable innovation is for the good of all Oz, as well as for the Animal’s own good. You see-- 74
He’s just excited to be here!
Now, the dimensions of the cage will vary, depe nding on the animal.
Well somebody’s got to DO SOMETHING!!
They’re falli ng asleep! Poppy dust.

scenes.heading: EXT. OUTSKIRTS OF CAMPUS - DAY
scenes.actionPreview: 61 61 Elphaba and Fiyero, with the Cub, run as fast as they can-- she spots, up ahead-- TWO BICYCLES, PROPPED AGAINST A TREE. scenes.heading: INT. CLASSROOM - DAY

dialogues.text: What in the name of Oz...?

scenes.actionPreview: 63 63 Morrible enters the classroom to find: everyone still fast asleep. And the cage, empty . Nikidik wakes up, sees: the Cub is missing! He’s baffled. Just then, the Students start to stir. They’re dazed, with no idea what happened . As Galinda opens her eyes, she looks around at her friends and s

scenes.heading: EXT. SHIZ WOODS - CLEARING - DUSK

dialogues.text: I’m not! (studying the Cub) I think he’s waking up.
Well, we can’t let him loose just anywhere, we’ve got to find someplac e
You don’t need to be scared of me--
Why is it you’re always causing some sort of commotion?
I don’t cause commotions, I am one!
So I should just keep my mouth shut?! Is that what you're saying?
You think I want to be this way?
You think I don’t know how much easier my life would be if I didn’t?!
D o you ever let anyone else talk?
You could’ve walked away back there.
So no matter how shallow and self- absorbed you pretend to be-- 78
Excuse me, there’s no pretense here: I happen to be genuinely self- absorbed and deeply shallow.
No, you’re not. Or you wouldn’t be so unhappy.
Fine. Look-- if you don't want my help--
What did you mean to do, back there? And why was I the only one you didn’t do it to?
Yeah... Or maybe it scratched me, or something.
(CONT’D) I better get to safety. I mean-- the Cub--
(CONT’D) HANDS TOUCH, EYES MEET SUDDEN SILENCE, SUDDEN HEAT HEARTS LEAP IN A GIDDY WHIRL
(CONT’D) DON’T DREAM TOO FAR DON’T LOSE SIGHT OF WHO YOU ARE DON’T REMEMBER THAT RUSH OF JOY
EV’RY SO OFTEN WE LONG TO STEAL TO THE LAND OF WHAT-MIGHT-HAVE-BEEN BUT THAT DOESN'T SOFTEN THE ACHE WE FEEL
Determined to return to reality, Elphaba starts back--

scenes.actionPreview: 64 64 They abandon the bikes. Fiyero wraps the sleeping Cub in his jacket in front of two diverging paths. But-- prove myself how?! It’s too soon,
Don’t be so pessi-mystical. You’ll find a way. I have faith in you.
My powers are purely meteorological. I can stop and start rain, make a bit
NOW YOU’RE OFF TO MEET THE WIZARD
AND THERE YOU’LL FIN’LLY BE: THE WIZARD--

And in the middle of it stands a beaming Morrible-- who spots Elphaba on the balcony, motions to her... The girls rush down to Morrible, who

scenes.heading: EXT. TRAIN STATION - PLATFORM - DAY

dialogues.text: Now, you’re sure you have everything? (no response)
(staring past Galinda) I can’t believe it.
Look who’s come to see you off!
Governor Thropp-- you received my message! So good of you
Of course! I treasure any chance to see my dear daughter. 85
And such an honor, that your other daughter be welcomed by the Wizard.
Yes. Let’s just hope she makes a good impression.
There you are! Father, this is Boq, the boy I wrote to you about!
I’ve heard so much about you. My
I understand. Well. I should-- uh-- (abruptly, to Galinda)

What?! I-- I have no feelings for
Oh, I’m sorry, I misunderstood. I thought we were being honest.

scenes.actionPreview: 70 70 He turns to her, in tears-- it makes her want to cry. 87 Oh, Boq. Why can’t you just love my sister? can’t ! (a beat) You think I like seeing Nessa hurt? I hate hurting anyone, but I can’t just change my feelings. Could you change yours, f or Fiyero? Fiyero! He looks at her: suddenly alarmingl

scenes.heading: EXT. TRAIN STATION - PLATFORM

dialogues.text: She left with your father. She said to wish you safe travels. (off Elphaba’s concern)
Oh, you’ll barely notice I’m gone.
I barely know him either, anymore!
About Dillamond. And that Lion Cub. I think about that day a lot.
Oh, me too! I think about it constantly. Poor Doctor Dillamond-- it makes one want to take a stand.
Since Doctor Di llamond had his own,
(CONT’D) (a noble sacrifice) I will henceforward be known-- no longer as “Ga-linda”... but as simply:
Good fortune, Elphaba!/Our best to the Wizard!/Don’t forget us!
It doesn't matter what your name is, everyone loves you!
Come on, you’ll miss your train!
"If You Have Just One Day in The
To see the Emerald City, and meet the Wizard!

scenes.actionPreview: 71 71 She’ll be fine, Elphie. She’ll have to manage without you. We all will. 88 You have Fiyero! (trying to sound casual) Where is he, anyway? Not that I expected him to say goodbye to me. I mean, we barely know each other. He’s-- different. Distant, and moodified... and he’s been thinking, which r

scenes.heading: INT. TRAIN - PASSENGER CAR - SAME
scenes.actionPreview: 72 72 The girls topple over, breathless; LAUGHING... As they get to their feet, brush each other off... Glinda pulls her friend into a grateful hug-- SONG: “ONE SHORT DAY”

scenes.heading: INT. TRAIN - PASSENGER CAR - LATER

dialogues.text: The girls gaze out the window, marveling at the city, off in the distance, carved out of giant mounds of emerald.
As the train pulls into the city, Elphaba and Glinda catch their breaths, and press their faces against the window, in happy anticipat ion--

scenes.actionPreview: 73 73 The girls sit next to each other, Glinda’s perfect veneer now askew from her mad dash. Both girls look out the window. The train WHISTLE BLASTS and when Elphaba looks up-- Glinda suddenly turns green. 92 Elphaba stares at her in shock, then realizes: that it’s the reflection of the Emerald Cit

scenes.heading: EXT. EMERALD CITY - DOWNTOWN - DAY
characters: FULL OF SO MUCH TO DO
THAT YOU LOOK IN THIS CITY

THAT YOU LOOK IN THIS CITY
dialogues.text: THERE'S SOMETHING EXQUISITE YOU’LL WANT TO VISIT BEFORE THE DAY’S THROUGH!
THERE ARE BUILDINGS TALL AS QUOXWOOD TREES
THERE ARE WONDERS LIKE I'VE NEVER SEEN
I THINK WE’VE FOUND THE PLACE WHERE WE BELONG!
SO I’LL BE BACK FOR GOOD SOMEDAY
TO MAKE MY LIFE AND MAKE MY WAY
BUT FOR TODAY WE’LL WANDER AND ENJOY...

scenes.actionPreview: 74 74 Elphaba and Glinda step off the train and take in the sparkling, glorious Downtown. An array of well-dressed OZIANS bustle about merrily. And all around, images of hot air balloons ... SERIES OF QUICK CUTS: QUOXWOOD TREES, A DRESS SALON, A 75 75 LIBRARY, A STREET VENDOR, A MUSEUM They arrive a

characters: TO HAVE A LIFETIME OF FUN

ELPHABA/GLINDA AND WE’RE WARNING THE CITY: NOW THAT WE’RE IN HERE YOU’LL KNOW WE’VE BEEN HERE BEFORE WE ARE DONE! Elphaba studies the sights, fascinated; Glinda studies... the con

scenes.heading: INT. EMERALD CITY - WIZ-O-MANIA
characters: TO HAVE A LIFETIME OF FUN

dialogues.text: Two mysterious figures emerge out of the fog...
SO LET US SET DOWN ALL OUR MAGIC...
IN A STRANGE AND SECRET LANGUAGE...
AND WITH THIS MAGIC BOOK WE’LL BLESS ALL OZ WITH MERRY- NESS!
BUT TIME TICKED EVER ONWARD, DAY BY DAY AND ALL THOSE WHO COULD READ IT PASSED AWAY
TILL ONE DAY NO ONE COULD...
AND WITHOUT OUR ANCIENT WISDOM THERE TOOK ROOT THE SEEDS OF WOE...
WOMEN now float as spirits (suspended from visible wires) in the “clouds” above...
IN OZ’S DARKEST HOUR THOUGH WE CANNOT SAY WHEN...
THERE WILL COME ONE WITH THE POWER TO READ THE GRIMMERIE AGAIN!
AND OZ ONCE MORE WILL BE SO MERRY THEN!
THIS MAN WHO COMES OUT OF THE BLUE IS HE THE PROPHECY? THERE’S ONE WAY WE’LL KNOW IF IT’S TRUE...
NOW EV’RY OZIAN RAISE A VOICE AND SING! AND SING! AND SING:
WHO’S THE SAGE WHO SAGELY SAILED IN TO SAVE OUR POSTERIERS?
WHOSE ENTHUSE FOR HOT AIR BALLOONING HAS ALL OF OZ HONEYMOONING? WOO--OO--OO ISN’T HE WONDERFUL? (OUR WONDERFUL WIZARD!)
IS MAKING ALL OZ MERRIER? WHO’S THE SAGE WHO SAGELY SAILED IN TO SAVE

scenes.actionPreview: 79 79 It’s like a theme park “ride,” Ozian style. Elphaba and Glinda are seated in a little car, (we glimpse a car or two behind them, containing TOURISTS.) The car travels our Girls up to the entrance of the ride. They read the sign on the doors aloud, together-- ELPHABA/GLINDA “Wizomania! How our

scenes.heading: EXT. EMERALD CITY - LATER

dialogues.text: There’s a huge GROUP OF HOPEFULS, all trying to see the
WE’LL CALL IT HOME TOO AND THEN, JUST LIKE NOW WE CAN SAY:
The Wizard will see you now!

scenes.actionPreview: 82 82 Elphaba and Glinda glide along the streets, headed for the Wizard’s Palace, up ahead, as they sing with the Crowd-- ELPHABA, GLINDA & CROWD Wizard, held back by a green gate, and a GATEKEEPER. 98 Elphaba steps forward, holds up her personal invitation-- The Crowd and the gate parts, revealing:

scenes.heading: INT. WIZARD’S PALACE - HALL OF GRANDIOSITY - NIGHT

dialogues.text: Listen to me, Elphaba Thropp. You can do this. You can do

scenes.actionPreview: 85 85 It’s (almost comically) ornate. Identically uniformed MONKEY GUARDS stand at attention against either wall. More doors open, revealing CHISTERY, a more impressively uniformed Monkey, with a commanding, dynamic energy. Chistery nods solemnly to Elphaba, and motions her to follow him, but then--

scenes.heading: INT. WIZARD’S PALACE - THRONE ROOM - CONTINUOUS
characters: I DO THE BEST I CAN

dialogues.text: I. AM. OZ! The Great and Terrible.
I am Elphaba. Thropp. Your Oz-ness.
I know, it’s a bit much. But folks expect this sort of thing-- (half sings, dances this)
And get a load of this!
It just says “road” to me. (looking closer)
Well- it doesn’t have to be.
Something bad is happen ing to them.
(after a beat) I thought you might say that. It’s the darndest thing, it’s almost like-- I already know you.
Well, that’s what I love best.
WHO ALWAYS LONGED TO BE A FATHER THAT’S WHY

dialogues.character: I DO THE BEST I CAN
dialogues.text: TO TREAT EACH CITIZEN OF OZ AS SON-- (beams at Elphaba) OR DAUGHTER--! SO ELPHABA, I'D LIKE TO RAISE YOU HIGH 'CUZ I THINK EV'RYONE DESERVES THE CHANCE TO FLY
(CONT’D) AND HELPING YOU WITH YOUR ASCENT ALLOWS ME
FOR I AM-- A SENTIMENTAL MAN...
Oh Dearie, I couldn’t miss your big moment. (noticing Glinda, dryly)
I don’t believe it. Is that...? ELPHABA/GLINDA
Yes. Our Ancient Book of Wisdom,
You’re right. We mustn’t rush her.
So. Which spell will you start with?
Well, we’ve been working on levitation--
Have you? You know, Chistery, here-- (he motions to Chistery)
Oh. But-- how could I-- ever--
A lost language... our lost language of spells.

scenes.actionPreview: 86 86 AN ENORMOUS HEAD, ON A THRONE, looms over them. The girls summon their courage, move closer, into this DARK SPACE-- Suddenly, the HEAD LIGHTS UP-- and SPEAKS! The girls, terrified, clutch each other-- Who are you and why do you seek me? Say something, say something-- Elphaba bravely steps forw

scenes.heading: INT. WIZARD’S PALACE - HALL OF GRANDIOSITY - SAME

dialogues.text: (to the Wizard) I knew it! I knew she had the power, I told you!

scenes.actionPreview: 88 88 ...where she discovers: the other Monkey Guards struggling, writhing-- SPROUTING WINGS. no...! Unable to control their new wings, the Monkeys start to zoom into the air, careening like bats with no radar. Elphaba backs away, horrified. The Wizard, Morrible, and Glinda appear, staring, amazed.

scenes.heading: INT. WIZARD’S PALACE - THRONE ROOM

dialogues.text: You’re right. That’s a harsh word.
Seditious Animal activity? What are you...? 109
I’m sure the Wizard has a good reason...
We’re doing this to keep people safe. All of Oz will benefit.
You w ill benefit, too, Dearie. You must trust me--
Elphaba... when I first got here, there was discord and discontent-- and back where I come from, everyone knows the best way to bring folks together is-- give them a really good enemy.
Miss Elphaba, you are talking to the Wizard of Oz! 110
Exactly. That’s why I need you.
Why not? (sings) THE TWO OF YOU, IT’S TIME I RAISED YOU HIGH
FOR YOU TO HAVE THE CHANCE TO--

scenes.actionPreview: 88A 88A How about... scouts? They’ll fly around Oz-- and report back any seditious Animal activity! Elphaba starts to put the pieces together. Elphaba stares at the Wizard, realizing... you . You’re behind it all. People, turning against the Animals... it’s because of you. You’ve known all along...

scenes.heading: INT. WIZARD’S PALACE - HALL OF GRANDIOSITY - CONTINUOUS
scenes.actionPreview: 88B 88B Morrible enters the hall, addresses the Monkeys-- yourselves some good, and keep your families safe-- you’ll stay loyal to our Wizard! The Monkeys rise into the air... 112 Don’t let her get away...! At that, the Monkeys explode out of every window, doorway, and skylight.

scenes.heading: INT. WIZARD’S PALACE - EMERALD HALLWAY - SAME
scenes.actionPreview: 89 89 Elphaba runs down a hallway made completely of emeralds as Glinda chases after her-- Elphaba ignores her, tries various doors along the way-- all locked. Elphaba keeps running, Glinda is falling behind. The shadows of flying Monkeys dart across the semi- translucent, emerald walls. Shit’s gett

scenes.heading: INT. WIZARD’S PALACE - THRONE ROOM/CONTROL ROOM - SAME
scenes.actionPreview: 90 90 The Wizard stands behind the curtain, frantically pulls some levers, and the Oz head comes to life-- The human Guards race into the Throne Room and stand at attention. 113

dialogues.text: Where are we? Elphie, please, just-- WIZARD’S OZ HEAD VOICE (O.S.)

scenes.actionPreview: 92 92 Elphaba and Glinda scramble from the balloon’s basket onto stairs that lead into An attic space, cluttered with cobwebs and various dust- covered objects from the Wizard’s carny past: a unicycle, a set of juggling clubs, a push-cart labeled “Potions N’ Potables” with an old broom on top of it.

scenes.heading: INT. WIZARD’S PALACE -

dialogues.text: (after a beat) I’m not. It’s the Wizard who should be afraid. Of me! (then) I’ve got the book. And I’m going to tell everyone the truth.
I know. (sings) BUT I DON’T WANT IT-- NO-- I CAN’T WANT IT
(with new understanding) I’m not that girl. (sings) SOMETHING HAS CHANGED WITHIN ME
I'M THROUGH WITH PLAYING BY THE RULES OF
She’s backing away from his pathetic carny stuff, from all the fraudulence and lies surrounding her...
(CONT’D) TOO LATE FOR SECOND GUESSING TOO LATE TO GO BACK TO SLEEP IT'S TIME TO TRUST MY INSTINCTS
Elphaba backs into a narrow spiral stairway. She looks up:
AND YOU CAN'T PULL ME DOWN...
CAN'T I MAKE YOU UNDERSTAND, YOU'RE HAVING DELUSIONS OF GRANDEUR...?
I'M THROUGH ACCEPTING LIMITS 'CAUSE SOMEONE SAYS THEY'RE SO SOME THINGS I CANNOT CHANGE BUT TILL I TRY,
TOO LONG I'VE BEEN AFRAID OF LOSING LOVE I GUESS I'VE LOST 117
AND YOU CAN'T PULL ME DOWN...

scenes.actionPreview: LOWER ATTIC - SAME 94 94 Elphaba and Glinda listen, frozen, barely breathing, as Morrible’s voice is broadcast throughout the palace-- MORRIBLE’S VOICE She is evil-- responsible for the mutilation of these poor innocent monkeys! dialogues.text: AND NOBODY IN ALL OF OZ-- NO WIZARD THAT THERE IS OR WAS-- IS EVER GONNA BRING ME DOWN!

scenes.actionPreview: 101 101 Glinda sits slumped, despondent, on the floor; flanked by two Guards. She HEARS something, scrambles to her feet-- It’s Morrible... who moves silently closer, and then-- pulls Glinda into an embrace. We glimpse both relief and fear in Glinda’s eyes... 102 INT./EXT. dialogues.text: SO WE'VE GOT TO BRING HER ...

scenes.actionPreview: 106 106 Down below, Ozians stare up at her, horrified-- But no one can touch her. Elphaba comes into her power, and she’s no longer afraid of that power-- she’s embracing it.
